body:
This is working as intended. @sbinet suggestion is the perfect answer for this problem.

Perhaps you're thrown off by the "customized error message": Short variable declarations of the form:

_ := expr

are not permitted and the error is "no new variables on left side of :=". But here it is "invalid variable name _ in switch", indicating that the two situations are not handled by the same check. But the effect is the same, in both cases an invalid program is rejected.
